tool_description: Get info about channel, playlist, video, get trendings or search everything you want in YouTube
title: Youtube Search and Download

api_list.name: About channel

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Channel id

api_list.name: Channel

parameters.name: next
parameters.description:
Pagination(continuation) parameter to get next channel video, no need any other parameters if 'next' present.
Can be obtained from inside channel request result.

parameters.name: filter
id
parameters.description: Channel id.

parameters.name: sort

api_list.name: Video related

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Video id

parameters.name: next
parameters.description:
Pagination(continuation) parameter to get more related videos, no need any other parameters if 'next' present.
Can be obtained from first response.

parameters.name: hl
parameters.description: Locale/language for request

parameters.name: gl
parameters.description: Country code  like US(default), UK, BE, etc...

api_list.name: Video comments
api_list.description:
Get video comments list.
If you need sorting then use "sortTopNext" or "sortNewestNext"  fields from first response and pass it to "next" parameter.

parameters.name: next
parameters.description:
Pagination(continuation) parameter to get more comments , no need any other parameters if 'next' present. Could be used for sorting, just pass \"sortNewestNext\" or \"sortTopNext\" field values for newest or top sorting.
Can be obtained from response with \"id\" parameter in request

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Video id to get first part of comments.

api_list.name: Trending

parameters.name: hl
parameters.description: Locale/language for request

parameters.name: gl
parameters.description: Country from you want get trendings like US(default), UK, BE, etc...

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
Type of trending videos:
n - now (default)
mu - music
mo - movies
g - gaming

api_list.name: Video info

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Video id from YouTube

api_list.name: Playlist

parameters.name: next
parameters.description:
Pagination(continuation) parameter to get more playlist items, no need any other parameters if 'next' present.
Can be obtained from inside playlist request result.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Playlist id

api_list.name: Search videos/channels/playlists
api_list.description: Search any youtube content with all available filters

parameters.name: upload_date
sort
features
next
parameters.description:
Pagination(continuation) parameter to get next result for same search query, no need any other parameters if 'next' present.
Can be obtained from inside search result.

parameters.name: hl
parameters.description: Search language

parameters.name: duration
gl
parameters.description: Search location

parameters.name: type
query
parameters.description: Search query you want to search
